html: David Mermelstein, a Holocaust survivor right here in Miami, spoke at tonight’s #YomHaShoah ceremony at #HolocaustMemorialMiami. text:
David Mermelstein, a Holocaust survivor right here in Miami, spoke at tonight’s #YomHaShoah ceremony at #HolocaustMemorialMiami.

Thx for mentioning me on our struggle to get justice for survivors.

So many need care.

We cannot forget that each survivor has a name.

Honor them.pic.twitter.com/RollW5GjHC

html: Bienvenido a Miami, @silviojbaez! Monseñor: un honor tenerlo en nuestra comunidad. El pueblo nicaragüense en el exilio está unido, rezando por libertad, democracia y paz. html: To my fave Vietnam combat hero, Dexter Wayne Lehtinen. Severely injured. Lifetime wounds. Seen and unseen. He doesn’t call himself a hero. Far from it. Dex values the service of every patriot who wears our uniform. Whether in battle or not. #VietnamVeteransDaypic.twitter.com/EWlBqZd7mo
text:
To my fave Vietnam combat hero, Dexter Wayne Lehtinen.

Severely injured.

Lifetime wounds. Seen and unseen.

He doesn’t call himself a hero. Far from it.

Dex values the service of every patriot who wears our uniform. 

Whether in battle or not. 

#VietnamVeteransDaypic.twitter.com/EWlBqZd7mo

text:
Before I could even get the question out, @RosLehtinen interrupted and said: "No. No. I know what you are going to ask and the answer is no. I don't even want that rumor out there. No. I have a wonderful life and my plate is full. No."

So should we put her down as a maybe?

html: Withdrawal from #Syria does not align with the admin's own commendable, stated goals: an enduring defeat of #ISIS, countering #Iran, and a political resolution without #Assad. Accomplishing these goals and protecting US interests requires exerting influence on the ground.

html: This Thursday, November 15th is #GiveMiamiDay. This is a great opportunity to support orgs that contribute to our #SoFla community thru programs + initiatives for those in need. Find more info on how you can help our nonprofits here:https://bit.ly/11litwm
